answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.It could be that the above mentioned disorders are contributing towards your fatigue. But sometimes, Anemia, Diabetes Mellitus and Hypothyroidism could cause the symptoms described by you. A simple blood test could help detect anemia, diabetes and hypothyroidism. Consult your primary care physician for these tests.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: I have fibromyalgia and IBS and also suffer from stress, anxiety and depression. For the past few weeks I am constantly tired and as an effect, I feel constantly ill. Could this be related?And how can I treat it?It is really affecting my work and personal life
title: Is it related?
